scenes.background: [Monica] flips through her notes, looking flustered. [Bob] taps his foot impatiently.
scenes.description: 'We need to prioritize this, but I'm not sure where to start. Any suggestions?'

options.text: Let's break it down into smaller tasks and tackle them one by one.
options.analysis: You suggested a structured approach, showing good perception and social skills, but your self-regulation could be stronger.

options.text: Monica, can you outline the most critical issues first?
options.analysis: You asked Monica to prioritize the issues, demonstrating empathy, but the overall engagement and motivation to resolve the issue were moderate.

options.text: We don't have time to overthink this. Bob, start with what you think is most urgent.
options.analysis: You aimed to keep the discussion focused and efficient, demonstrating strong self-regulation, but lower empathy and motivation to address the problem collaboratively.
